root.name: Crime Stories: From the Files of Martin Mystère
root.description: Based on the famous comic Martin Mystère by Alfredo Castelli: Crime Stories is is a classically styled point and click adventure mystery. When a fellow Professor, Eulembery of M.I.T, is found murdered, Professor Martin Mystère is thrust into a series of strange twist and turns. With the assistance of Diana, his girlfriend, and Java, his assistant, Martin must follow any leads and study every clue if he's going to have any hope of solving such a strange case. Could the Professor's research really have lead to his death? Is there really a link between his death in New York and an Aztec archaeological site in Mexico? System Requirements Windows ME/2000/XP Pentium III 866 MHz processor 128 MB RAM 32 MB video card 32x CD-ROM drive 700 MB hard drive space
